text: Drepanodontus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Drepanodontus include: * Drepanodontus tatyanae Harasewych & Kantor, 2004 ==References== Category:Buccinidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Drepanodontus
